title: Key Fragments Question
body: Is the maximum amount of key fragments you can earn in four weeks affected by the key fragments you get from capsules? In other words, are the key fragments from capsules strictly extra, or do they exist to help you reach the cap each month faster?

replies.body: Nope! Any key fragments you get from Honor Capsules are strictly extras, so you'll still be able to earn your usual 12 fragments throughout the month. Grats!!
